title: Discovery Channel Magazine Font
content:
I recently bought a copy of this and really like the main typeface they use. I have tried finding it but can’t seem to match it. It also has a matching slab serif. Can anyone help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RIMG0002.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203206/http:/typophile.com/files/RIMG0002.jpg) | 45.8 KB |

 [‹ EEurostile Normal - Know the Font, but Not the IP Owner](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203206/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50309 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Asta Gröting 'The Inner Voice' book cover - custom(ised) type, similar to Poplar {Tiff, Zachary O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203206/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30684 "Go to next forum topic")
author: antondhart

comments.content: Yes! Thanks Florian. Christian confirms the mag was designed by [Robb Rice](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203206/http:/robbricedesign.com/work.disc1.html) using Guardian.
